charges.charge_description: 18:1343, 2326 and 2 Wire Fraud; Telemarketing to Elderly Victims and Aid and Abet(12)

charges.charge_disposition: Custody of BOP for NINETY SIX (96) MOS. This term consists of FORTY EIGHT (48) MOS on Count 12 and FORTY EIGHT (48) MOS on Count 50, said counts to run consecutively. Custody of BOP for FIFTEEN (15) MOS on Count 71, said term to run concurrent to Counts 12 and 50. Followed by supervised release for a term of THREE (3) YRS on Count 12, 50 and 71 said counts to run concurrently. S/A: $300.00; FINE: $25,000.00; RESTITUTION: $365,334.33

charges.charge_description: 18:1014 and 2; False Statements on Loan and Credit Application and Aid and Abet(69)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to BOP for a term of SIX (6) MOS on Count 69. Followed by Supervised Release for a term of THREE (3) YRS on Count 69 of the Indictment.; S/A: $100. The Court recommends that the Bureau of Prisons consider designating the defendant to the State of Florida if it is otherwise consistent with the Bureau's needs and its evaluation of the defendant's needs. The Bureau needs to consider the defendant's Hodgkin's disease when it considers both designation and care. The defendant shall self-surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the BOP. In the absence of a designation, the defendant shall surrender to the United States Marshal in the Central District of Florida by 12:00 p.m. on 1/5/07.
